h2_title: Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide
content: Similarly, you'll also need to be careful if you want to employ your Immobilizing spell, as you don't watch to catch her with her body too high in the air to hit. Try instead to catch her right after an attack where she ducks low to strike at you, and make the most of that time or after staggering her when she falls down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Spider.md', within the main section titled 'Violet Spider', specifically from the subsection 'Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Similarly, you'll also need to be careful if you want to employ your Immobilizing spell, as you don't watch to catch her with her body too high in the air to hit. Try instead to catch her right after an attack where she ducks low to strike at you, and make the most of that time or after staggering her when she falls down.
